dsid, pars, _ = get_features_cached(app_notest)
method = V01 + '/categorization/'
with _silent('stderr'):
    res = app_notest.post(method, json={'parent_id': dsid, 'index': [0, 0, 
        0], 'y': ['ds', 'dsd', 'dsd'], 'method': 'LogisticRegression', 'cv': 0}
        )
data = parse_res(res)
assert res.status_code in [500, 422]
assert sorted(data.keys()) == ['messages']
